title: What's the typophile heading font?
content:
The one above that now reads “What’s the typophile heading font?”...

 [‹ The Round C](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002125507/http:/typophile.com/node/49869 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID - Beautiful Modernist face ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002125507/http:/typophile.com/node/49675 "Go to next forum topic")
author: athunt

comments.content:
Hi Andrew,  
have a look to the right; the sidebar shows a link to the Featured Face (that is, if you don’t run an ad blocker). At the moment, it’s [Charger](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002125507/http:/typophile.com/ad/redirect/49519/) from Veer.  
The Typophile logo and the top menu are set in Gotham, everything else is Georgia & Verdana.  
F
